# Directory introduction

This directory contains some of the files used in the single cell example.

c8.all.v2023.1.Hs.symbols.gmt: The C8 gene set was downloaded from https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb.

# Data link
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(fs)
x <- dir_info('examples/single_cell/cell_marker_db',
    recurse = TRUE, invert = TRUE, regexp = "[.]html$")[, 1:3] |>
    as.data.frame()
x_link <- gsub(x$path,
  pattern = "examples/single_cell/cell_marker.db/",
  replacement = ""
)
x$path <- sprintf("[%s](%s)", x_link, x_link)

knitr::kable(x, row.names = FALSE)
```
